Node Control Drivers¶

Ansible Runner¶

class AnsibleRunner(auth_vars)[source]¶

Bases: object

Ansible Runner is the interface between the library and the deployment. The library performs ansible tasks in order to execute commands. This class builds an ansible playbook file and runs it on a target host.

Parameters

auth_vars (dict) – Authentication variables for connecting to target host. View cloud_config.json for more info.

class AnsibleExecutionRecord(host, status, task, payload)¶

Bases: tuple

property host¶

Alias for field number 0

property payload¶

Alias for field number 3

property status¶

Alias for field number 1

property task¶

Alias for field number 2

execute(hosts, task)[source]¶

Execute a task on target hosts

Parameters

  • hosts (list) – List of hosts

  • task (dict) – Task that needs to be executed

Returns

List of Named tuples containing the ‘host’, ‘status’, ‘task’ and ‘payload’ in json format.

Return type

list

Base Driver¶

class BaseDriver(ansible_runner: anomaly_injection.node_control.drivers.ansible_runner.AnsibleRunner)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base driver class. All drivers receive AnsibleRunner objects.

Variables

ansible_executor – AnsibleRunner object

Parameters

ansible_runner (drivers.ansible_runner.AnsibleRunner) – AnsibleRunner object

Container Driver¶

class DockerContainer(ansible_runner: anomaly_injection.node_control.drivers.ansible_runner.AnsibleRunner)[source]¶

Bases: anomaly_injection.node_control.drivers.base_driver.BaseDriver

restart(name, host)[source]¶

Restart the container

start(name, host)[source]¶

Start the container.

stop(name, host)[source]¶

Stop the container

stress(name, host, stressors)[source]¶

Perform stress test on the container using stress-ng. Note: dockhack is used in order to run the stressors on the resource group that the containers belongs to.

param name

Container name

type name

str

param host

Hostname

type name

str

param stressors

stress-ng arguments

type stressors

str

terminate(name, host)[source]¶

Terminate the container
